channel.title: Resources on Product Manager Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Product Manager Playbook

item.title: Articles & Blogs
item.description: A curated selection of articles and blogs covering product management, discovery, strategy, delivery, leadership, and industry trends.

item.title: Books
item.description: Essential books for Product Managers, covering product discovery, strategy, leadership, systems thinking, and modern product practices.

item.title: Communities
item.description: Product management communities where practitioners share knowledge, experiences, challenges, and opportunities for growth.

item.title: Courses & Certifications
item.description: Courses and certifications to build, validate, and deepen product management skills across discovery, delivery, strategy, and leadership.

item.title: Podcasts
item.description: Podcasts featuring conversations, interviews, and insights on product management, startups, technology, and leadership.
